docs.snippet: GENEVA, Aug. 18 (Associated Press). --South America probably, will play the leading role at the third assembly of the League of Nations, which opens here on Sept. 4, in consequence of the numbers of questions of world-wide importance which have been...
docs.lead_paragraph: GENEVA, Aug. 18 (Associated Press). --South America probably, will play the leading role at the third assembly of the League of Nations, which opens here on Sept. 4, in consequence of the numbers of questions of world-wide importance which have been placed before the League by the South American members.
docs.abstract: plans for Assembly; topics to be discussed

headline.main: CHIEF LEAGUE TOPIC IS SOUTH AMERICA; Questions Concerning Nations of This Hemisphere Promise to Take First Place in Assembly. HUNGARY UP FOR ADMISSION Edwards of Chile Strong Candidate for President--Proposal for American League to Be Considered.

docs.snippet: As the good ship Pan America "rolls down to Rio," flying our starry flag and the official standard of our Secretary of State, who is to be present at the opening of the exposition there, it may not prove amiss to attempt a short survey of the Latin...
docs.lead_paragraph: As the good ship Pan America "rolls down to Rio," flying our starry flag and the official standard of our Secretary of State, who is to be present at the opening of the exposition there, it may not prove amiss to attempt a short survey of the Latin American horizon and the new relations between the northern and southern divisions of our continent.
docs.abstract: S Bonsal cites opportunities for Sec Hughes to further peace efforts with Brazil, sp art

headline.main: NEW TIES WITH BRAZIL; Visit of Hughes Affords Opportunity for Secretary to Further Peace Efforts

docs.snippet: Rates for foreign remittances moved higher yesterday, the market's firmness being attributed to continued scarcity of commercial bills.
docs.lead_paragraph: Rates for foreign remittances moved higher yesterday, the market's firmness being attributed to continued scarcity of commercial bills.

headline.main: FOREIGN EXCHANGE; Rates Move Higher in Firm Market--Czechoslovakia Sellsat New High.

docs.snippet: European exchanges continued easier again yesterday, conspicuous weakness being registered in the German, French and Belgian rates, the former establishing a new low for all time at 6 onehundredthes of a cent, with Paris and Brussels checks...
docs.lead_paragraph: European exchanges continued easier again yesterday, conspicuous weakness being registered in the German, French and Belgian rates, the former establishing a new low for all time at 6 onehundredthes of a cent, with Paris and Brussels checks approximating previous lows made early in July.

headline.main: FOREIGN EXCHANGES; Ease in Market Continues-- German, French and Belgian Suffer Sharp Setback.
